Html:
hello

I try to use dataJS in a metro app (win 8 ) but i have this error :

( an active x component can't create an object )

someone know how to fixe it ?

Hi Nbgfi,

    Thank you for letting us know this. We will look into this.  By the way, are you using the latest Win8 preview?

Regards,

Alex Trigo.

Hi Nbgfi,

please see my post for a workaround:

http://datajs.codeplex.com/discussions/357673

 

You've to change one function in the datajs library and remove the active x code.

 

Cheers,

Thomas
